# HTML Playground

Testing vite-html-llms plugin

## about.html

About

# About This Plugin

The vite-html-llms plugin converts HTML pages to LLM-friendly markdown format.

## How It Works

1. Scans your built HTML files
2. Converts them to markdown
3. Generates llms.txt and llms-full.txt

========================================

## index.html

HTML Playground

# Welcome to HTML Playground

This is a test page for vite-html-llms.

## Features

- Automatic HTML to Markdown conversion
- LLM-optimized content generation
- Easy integration with Vite
